name: Jigsaw Puzzles +
description:
Welcom to Jigsaw Daily Puzzle - the colorful world of jigsaw puzzles, we offer tons of HD WELL-DESIGNED and HIGH QUALITY pictures. You can slice the puzzle form 9 pieces to 400 pieces, Whether you are a kid or a jigsaw expert, you can find the best way to play here.
Download Jigsaw Daily Puzzle now, play with your friends and family,it feels like playing a physical jig saw game on table, but it is more convenient. You may play our jigsaw anywhere you go,anytime you feel boring,any difficulty you like,you will get a relaxing experience.. You can take your jigsaw puzzle anywhere you go. Choose your own difficulty level for every picture. And you'll get a lot of awesome puzzles.
Features:
· Tons of free beautiful, high quality pictures with a variety of categories: Flowers, Animals, Colorful, Nature, Animals, Arts, Children
· Each jigsaw piece has a unique shape.
· Get free new puzzle every week.
· Unlock mystery collections. Follow the guide of the mission to collect mystery puzzle pieces.
· Enjoy the weekly new puzzles.
· Use hints if you feel that some similar pieces are bothering you.
· Freely choose the difficulty of the game, from 9 to 400 puzzle pieces. The more pieces, the harder your game becomes
· Use rotation mode, make the game more tricky
· Custom backgrounds. Choose your favorite appearance to play with more pleasure.

Download and join our funest Jigsaw photo puzzle game now, make every day relaxing and fun putting puzzle pieces together!

Subscription Options:

• Your subscription will renew automatically each month and payment will be charged to your iTunes Account within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.
• You can turn off auto-renewal by going to your Account Settings after purchase.
• No cancellation of your subscription is allowed during the active subscription period.
